data.name: Mugen Souls Z - Clothing Bundle 1
data.detailed_description:
Includes the following DLC packs:


Magical Bishop Set ZZ: Includes Tiger Headgear, Magical Hat, Infirmary Thermometer, Mechanical Eye, Bishop One Piece, Bishop Tights, Bishop Boots, Side Up Semi-Long, Wonder.

Ribbon Knight Set: Includes Red Ribbon Pair, Red Earrings, Red and White Armor, Pleated Short Skirt, Red and White Boots, Long Over One Eye, Bold Eyes.

Ultimate Homemade + Gym Set: Includes Ultra Red and White Hat, Red Bean Bread, Short-Sleeve Gym Uniform, Child’s Bloomers, Red-Laced Gym Shoes, Little Topknot, Positive, Dumpling Ribbon, Homemade Specs, Fortified Guard, Fortified Skirt, Fortified Wing Books, Sideburns, Nonsense.

Ultimate New Wife’s Domination Set: Includes New Wife’s Ribbon, Sexy Beauty Mark, New Wife Apron, Skin-Colored Panties, Pink Slippers, Short Ponytail, Half-Lidded, Pom Pom Beret, Prestige Makeup, Conquering Blazer, Conquering Skirt, Conquering Slip-Ons, Short Drill, Malcontent.

Gothic Queen Set: Includes Knitted Cat-Ear Hat, Queen’s Mask, Queen’s Clothing, Queen’s Secret Shorts, Queen’s Long Boots, Gorgeous Wave, Bewitching, Fluorescent Ribbon, Lightning Thunder Eye, Frilly Gothic Dress, Frilly Gothic Skirt, Monotone Heels, Asymmetrical Twin Tails, Mugen Eyes.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here: http://mugen-souls.wikia.com/wiki/Mugen_Souls_Z_DLC

data.short_description: Includes the following DLC packs:Magical Bishop Set ZZRibbon Knight SetUltimate Homemade + Gym SetUltimate New Wife’s Domination SetGothic Queen Set* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
ΕΛΑΧΙΣΤΕΣ:
  • ΛΣ: Windows XP
  • Επεξεργαστής: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Μνήμη: 4 GB RAM
  • Γραφικά: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Έκδοση 9.0c
  • Αποθήκευση: 4 GB διαθέσιμος χώρος
  • Κάρτα ήχου: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
ΠΡΟΤΕΙΝΟΜΕΝΕΣ:
  • ΛΣ: Windows 7 or later
  • Επεξεργαστής: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Μνήμη: 4 GB RAM
  • Γραφικά: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Έκδοση 9.0c
  • Αποθήκευση: 4 GB διαθέσιμος χώρος
  • Κάρτα ήχου: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
